backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing contacts, appointment requests, user profiles, admin‑only domain drafts, and a decommission mode with full access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding‑related features, associated components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose and content of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document setting metadata, Open Graph tags, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all main site routes with change frequency and priority settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration wiring all pages with SiteLayout, including domain draft and decommissioned routes.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: Appointment request form with validation, department selection, success/error states, and submission via custom hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: A contact form component with client-side validation, submission via useSubmitContact, and success/error handling.
A hero section component supporting variants, optional badge, subtitle, and cache‑busted background patterns.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeroI: Displays a hero image with cache-busting and error fallback UI for generated assets.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: A layout wrapper providing padded sections with optional background variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: The site footer showing branding, contact details, hours, and a cache‑busted logo with error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: The main header with emergency bar, navigation links, logo, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Global page layout combining header, footer, SEO manager, and a main content area.
frontend/src/components/seo/Organization: Injects JSON‑LD schema for the medical organization into the page head.
frontend/src/components/seo/SeoManager.t: Dynamically updates document head tags for SEO based on the current route.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines hospital branding constants and a helper for composing page titles.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exposes build ID and formatted build version for cache‑busting and display.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Centralized contact details plus helpers for emergency and main phone links.
frontend/src/config/seo.ts: Defines site-wide and per-route SEO metadata plus helpers for titles, descriptions, and canonical URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainDraft.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save a domain draft via the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Mutation hook to submit appointment requests through the backend actor with normalized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Mutation hook to submit contact form data to the backend actor with user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark hospital-themed design tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero sections, mission/vision cards, facilities image, and core values.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Renders an appointment request page with hero images, booking steps, consultation photos, and an appointment form.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact info including phone, email, location, hours, and a contact form with supporting images.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Shows a decommissioned service notice with hero imagery and a card explaining temporary unavailability.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Lists medical suites with doctor details, specialties, availability, and supporting hero and team images.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Provides a UI for authenticated users to view and save domain drafts, with loading states and hero sections.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Presents emergency contact info, ambulance details, emergency services, and guidance on when to seek urgent care.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component with hero section, call‑to‑action buttons, image handling, and cache‑busted asset loading.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page showing navigation help, illustrations, and a button returning users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services listing page displaying medical service cards, hero section, and equipment imagery.
frontend/src/utils/generatedAssets.ts: Utility functions that detect generated assets and append a cache‑busting build ID to their URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, spacing, shadows, and typography with custom theming.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, logo update requirements, and pending feature requests.
